description:
Replacement of front basement casement window with timber sash casement window, together with modification of existing conservatory and replacement with single storey rear extension door and glazed roof; stripping and rendering existing rear return and formation of new timber sash ground floor window on flank wall as well as replacement of two first floor windows within existing openings on flank wall of rear return together with associated internal works involving lowering of basement floor, removal and insertion of new partitions in basement, ground and first floors. 
[Listed Building Consent P2014/1071 application also submitted]
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
